pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, June 19, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, June 19, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver an address at the University of Ottawa convocation.               

Canada Hall 2-3
Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:45 a.m. and present themselves at the main entrance (corner of Colonel By and Daly Avenue)

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Governor General’s Presentation of Canadian Honours in recognition of Outstanding Indigenous Leadership.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Media wishing to cover this event are asked to confirm their attendance with the Rideau Hall Press Office, and must arrive at the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 10:45 a.m. on the day of the ceremony.
  • Marie-Pierre Bélanger  / Rideau Hall Press Office:
    613-998-9166 (office)
    613-852-3248 (cell)
    marie-pierre.belanger@gg.ca

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
